formal_name:
Harvest Moon:
The Tale of Two Towns
description:
Years ago, a tunnel connected the
livestock-loving Bluebell Village with
the crop-growing town of Konohana,
but boisterous bickering between the
burgs created a cave-in and collapsed
the tunnel! Build a bustling farm,
befriend the villagers and maybe you
can find a way to bring these towns
together once again!
name:
Harvest Moon:
The Tale of Two Towns
